name: TRAFFICK REPORT
description:
There is something fascinating about watching drivers navigate tricky roads. This one was the best, the notorious round-about that is the Arc de Triomphe.

Our staple oversized scarf made from 100% flat silk chiffon with a rolled hem finish.

name: FONTE GAIA
description:

Our staple oversized scarf made from 100% flat silk chiffon with a rolled hem finish.

name: TYPOGRAPHIC LOVE
description:
We love hand drawn typography, especially in a large scale that we find right on our doorstep. This snippet is an obscured section of shape and colour. Can you guess what the full sign reads?

Our staple oversized scarf made from 100% flat silk chiffon with a rolled hem finish.

name: THE PORT OF ESSAOUIRA
description:
Colourful fishing boats pack into this old-town harbour port. Our fresh fish feast was a treat and it was amazing to watch the locals haul their catch. An important industry for this pretty city.

Our staple oversized scarf made from 100% flat silk chiffon with a rolled hem finish.
160 x 130cm. Dry clean only.

name: MOTHERLAND CLASSICS 2
description:
We've taken our favourite prints from past and present, and printed them on the most amazing 100% modal we could find, with some tassels for good measure. Made in Italy on the fine shores of Lake Como, these are a little bit of luxury for your neck. Yum! Available without tassels on request.

100% modal with machine hem finish.
160 x 130cm. Dry clean only.
Free shipping Australia & NZ. AUD.

name: BITS OF BERLIN
description:
This season we took our fun head-square scarf and featured a deconstructed building facade from one of our favourite cities. Berlin is a city full stories. If the buildings could talk, I'm sure they would have some interesting tales to tell.

100% silk twill with rolled hem finish.
90 x 90cm. Dry clean only.
Free shipping Australia & NZ. AUD.

description:
This season we took our fun head-square scarf and featured a deconstructed building facade from one of our favourite cities. We love London, and can never get enough of its melting pot of architecture and the combination of past-meets-present-meets-future. It won't be the last you see of this great city from us.

name: BROWN SATCHEL
description:
For our first range of very limited and exclusive bags, we've collaborated with Artemis to create our vision in leather.

Meet our Shoulder Bag. Made to our specs with amazing Italian vegetable tanned leather, hand stitched and finished to minimal perfection. If you think this bag is good looking now, you should see it as it ages.

Approx size = 36cm x 30cm x 9cm
Internal pocket = 20 x 20cm
100% Leather.
